metadata.title: CVE-2016-1522 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Code.cpp in Libgraphite in Graphite 2 1.2.4, as used in Mozilla Firefoxbefore 43.0 and Firefox ESR 38.x before 38.6.1, does not consider recursiveload calls during a size check, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) or possibly executearbitrary code via a crafted Graphite smart font.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgraphite2-3 - 1.3.5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphite2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.5-1ubuntu1').
